name: C3S XCH4 v4.3
description: This directory contains measurements from Copernicus <INSTRUMENTS> saved in the format of NETCDF4. Each file contains measurements of CH4 (methane).  Its time span is from 2003-<month> to 2020-<month>.  The spacial resolution is 5 x 5 degress which is approximately a 555 sqkm and global range. Time resolution is monthly . Data curator is Dr. Marcio Teixeira (mjt@if.usp.br) from Institute of Physics, University of Sao Paulo, Brazil.  Other relevant information: gridded data
references: M. Reuter, H. Bösch, H. Bovensmann, A. Bril, M. Buchwitz, A. Butz, J. P. Burrows, C. W. ODell, S. Guerlet, O. Hasekamp, J. Heymann, N. Kikuchi, S. Oshchepkov, R. Parker, S. Pfeifer, O. Schneising, T. Yokota, and Y. Yoshida: A joint effort to deliver satellite retrieved atmospheric CH4 concentrations for surface flux inversions: the ensemble median algorithm EMMA. Atmospheric Chemistry and Physics,13, 1771-1780, 2013

name: C3S XCO2 v4.3
description: This directory contains measurements from Copernicus <INSTRUMENTS> saved in the format of NETCDF4. Each file contains measurements of CO2 (carbon dioxide).  Its time span is from 2003-<month> to 2020-<month>.  The spacial resolution is 5 x 5 degress which is approximately a 555 sqkm and global range. Time resolution is monthly. Data curator is Dr. Marcio Teixeira (mjt@if.usp.br) from Institute of Physics, University of Sao Paulo, Brazil.
references: M. Reuter, H. Bösch, H. Bovensmann, A. Bril, M. Buchwitz, A. Butz, J. P. Burrows, C. W. ODell, S. Guerlet, O. Hasekamp, J. Heymann, N. Kikuchi, S. Oshchepkov, R. Parker, S. Pfeifer, O. Schneising, T. Yokota, and Y. Yoshida: A joint effort to deliver satellite retrieved atmospheric CO2 concentrations for surface flux inversions: the ensemble median algorithm EMMA. Atmospheric Chemistry and Physics,13, 1771-1780, 2013

name: MERGE-CPTEC
description: This directory contains measurements from IMERG <INSTRUMENTS> and ground measurements saved in the format of GRIB2 Each file contains volume of precipitation in milimeters.  Its time span is from 2000-<month> to 2022-<month>.  The spacial resolution is 0.1 x 0.1 degrees which is approximately 10 sqkm and range spanning from 60 degrees north to 60 degrees south. Time resolution is 30 min . Data curator is Dr. Marcio Teixeira (mjt@if.usp.br) from Institute of Physics, University of Sao Paulo, Brazil. Other relevant information:
references: Rozante, J. R.; Moreira, D. S. ; Gonçalves., L. G. G. ; Vila, Daniel A. . Combining TRMM and Surface Observations of Precipitation: Technique and Validation Over South America. Weather and Forecasting, v. 25, p. 885-894, 2010.

name: OCO2_L4
description: This directory contains measurements from OCO2<INSTRUMENTS> saved in the format of NetCDF. Each file contains measurements of (CO2) (carbon dioxide).  Its time span is from 2014-<START_DATE> to 2020-<END_DATE>.  The spacial resolution is 1 x 1 degrees which is approximately a 111 to 110 km and global range. Time resolution is daily. Data curator is Dr. Marcio Teixeira (mjt@if.usp.br) from Institute of Physics, University of Sao Paulo, Brazil. Other relevant information: Gridded Level 4 bias-corrected XCO2
references: Hai Nguyen, Junjie Liu, Susan, Kulawik, David Baker, Jonathan Hobbs, Amy Braverman, Matthias Katzfuss, and Vineet Yadav (2022), OCO-2 Gridded bias-corrected XCO2 and other select fields aggregated as Level 4 daily files, Greenbelt, MD, USA, Goddard Earth Sciences Data and Information Services Center (GES DISC)

name: Tropomi
description: This directory contains measurements from Sentinel 5 TROPOMI  saved in the format of NetCDF. Each file contains measurements of CH4 (methane).  Its time span is from 2019-<START_DATE> to 2021-<END_DATE>.  The spacial resolution is  7 x 7 km and ranging from latitudes from -89.00 to 83.00  and longitudes from -179.99 to 179.99. Time resolution is 6 to 7 measurements daily. Data curator is Dr. Marcio Teixeira (mjt@if.usp.br) from Institute of Physics, University of Sao Paulo, Brazil. Other relevant information: Gridded Level 4 bias-corrected XCO2

name: AIRS/CH4_L3_2002_today
description: This directory contains measurements from ACQUA Atmospheric Infrared Sounder (AIRS) saved in HDF format. Each file contains measurements of CH4 (methane).  Its time span is from 2002-<START_DATE> to 2022-<END_DATE>.  The spacial resolution is 1 x 1 degrees which is approximately a 7 x 7 km swath and global range. Time resolution is daily. Data curator is Dr. Marcio Teixeira (mjt@if.usp.br) from Institute of Physics, University of Sao Paulo, Brazil. Other relevant information:  7 x 7 km  swath
references: AIRS project (2019), Aqua/AIRS L3 Daily Standard Physical Retrieval (AIRS-only) 1 degree x 1 degree V6.0, Greenbelt, MD, USA, Goddard Earth Sciences Data and Information Services Center (GES DISC).

name: AIRS/CO2_L3_2002_2012
description: This directory contains measurements from ACQUA Atmospheric Infrared Sounder (AIRS) saved in HDF format. Each file contains measurements of CO2 (carbon dioxide).  Its time span is from 2002-<START_DATE> to 2012-<END_DATE>.  The spacial resolution is 1 x 1 degrees which is approximately a 111 x 111 km and global range. Time resolution is daily. Data curator is Dr. Marcio Teixeira (mjt@if.usp.br) from Institute of Physics, University of Sao Paulo, Brazil. Other relevant information:  7 x 7 km swath, L3 data

name: AIRS/CH4_L3_2002_today
description: This directory contains measurements from ACQUA Atmospheric Infrared Sounder (AIRS) saved in HDF format. Each file contains measurements of CO2 (carbon dioxide).  Its time span is from 2002-<START_DATE> to 2012-<END_DATE>.  The spacial resolution is 1 x 1 degrees which is approximately a 111 x 111 km  and global range. Time resolution is daily. Data curator is Dr. Marcio Teixeira (mjt@if.usp.br) from Institute of Physics, University of Sao Paulo, Brazil. Other relevant information:  7 x 7 km  swath, L3 data

name: ERA5
description: This directory contains data from ERA5 saved in GRIB format. Each file contains measurements of  U and V components of wind velocity at 200, 500, 700 and 850 hPa.  Its time span is from 1979 to 2021.  The spacial resolution is 31 km grid spacing and data is available for the subregion delimited by latitudes 14.43 to-58.00 degrees and longitudes -30.00 to -84.00 degrees. Time resolution is hourly. Data curator is Dr. Marcio Teixeira (mjt@if.usp.br) from Institute of Physics, University of Sao Paulo, Brazil. Other relevant information: reanalysis data. Reliability study available at https://www.mdpi.com/1996-1073/14/14/4169

name: GEDI/Aboveground
description: This directory contains measurements from Global Ecossystem Dynamics Investigation (GEDI) from ISS saved GeoTIFF format. Each file contains information about  aboveground biomass density (AGBD).  Its time span is from 2019-09-18 to 2021-08-04.  The spatial resolution is 1 to 1 km and ranges from latitudes 52 to -52 degrees and longitudes 180 to -180. Time resolution is one time estimate for the whole period. Dr. Marcio Teixeira (mjt@if.usp.br) from Institute of Physics, University of Sao Paulo, Brazil. Other relavant info: there are 10 files that carry quality, errors as well as the methods used for inference. The mean AGBD information is available in the files in the format <filename>_MU.tiff

resolution.temporal: One time estimate for the whole period

name: GEDI/Land_Surface
description: This directory contains measurements from Global Ecossystem Dynamics Investigation (GEDI) from ISS saved in GeoTIFF format. Each file contains information about canopy heights and mean ground elevation.  Its time span is from 2019-09-18 to 2021-08-04.  The spatial resolution is 1 to 1 km and ranges from latitudes 52 to -52 degrees and longitudes 180 to -180. Time resolution is one time estimate for the whole period. Dr. Marcio Teixeira (mjt@if.usp.br) from Institute of Physics, University of Sao Paulo, Brazil. Other relavant info: this is a L3 product. There are 5 files available with information of mean and stdev canopy heights and mean and stdev elevation of the ground (both in meters). Please refer to documentation for further details.

resolution.temporal: One time estimate for the whole period

name: CO2_OCFP_TANSO
description: This directory contains measurements from GOSAT TANSO-FTS  saved in the format of NetCDF. Each file contains measurements of CO2 (carbon dioxide).  Its time span is from 2009-09-18 to 2020-06-30.  The spatial resolution is a 10 km diameter at nadir  which is approximately a 9.3 to 9.3 km square or 5' x 5' with  Global range. Time resolution is daily. Data curator is Dr. Marcio Teixeira (mjt@if.usp.br) from Institute of Physics, University of Sao Paulo, Brazil.

name: OMI_Aura/Data_L3
description: This directory contains measurements from OMI AURA saved in HDF5 format. Each file contains measurements of AOD (Aerosol Optical Depth), AAOD (aerosol absorption optical depth) and SSO (single scattering albedo).  Its time span is from 2004-10-01  to 2021-12-31.  The spatial resolution is 1 to 1 degrees which is approximately a 111 to 111 km and global range. Time resolution is daily. Data curator is Dr. Marcio Teixeira (mjt@if.usp.br) from Institute of Physics, University of Sao Paulo, Brazil. Other relevant information:  L3 data
